import React from 'react' import Profile from './../img/profileImg.jpg' import './PostShare.css' import {UilScenery} from '@iconscout/react-unicons' import {UilPlayCircle} from '@iconscout/react-unicons' import {UilLocationPoint} from '@iconscout/react-unicons' import {UilSchedule} from '@iconscout/react-unicons' const PostShare = () => { return (
Photo
Video
Location
Schedule
) } export default PostShare
